sermons.title: Our Reconciliation to God
sermons.description: A simple, upbeat inspiration on the basis, effect, place, result, and means of our reconciliation to God. The speaker interjected testimonies throughout the sermon and based his thoughts on the account of a man who lived a good life without Christ, until one day…God met him and totally changed him.

sermons.title: What Does Jesus Mean to Me?
sermons.description: This message addresses the greatest need of the church in America today, namely, "How do I live out Biblical Christianity in every day life?". You will be challenged to a deeper appreciation for what Christ has done for us.
